metadata.proposal_title: MultiWeave: Cross‐Model Collaboration and Orchestration of Multi‐Model AI Systems

checks.name: Project & Usage Alignment
checks.notes:
PyTorch is a deep learning framework in Python for training AI models. The proposed research uses it for coding their MultiWeave collaboration Framework. 
Aligns with the approved research topic Datascience and engineering

checks.notes: No mention of sensitive terms in the documentation of PyTorch.

checks.name: Project & Usage Alignment
checks.notes:
Hugging Face Transformers is an open-source Python library providing state-of-the-art pretrained models for natural language processing, computer vision, audio, and multimodal tasks for both inference and training.

The software is used to:

Coordinate cross-model collaboration among multiple large language models
Implement contextual bandit and baseline routing algorithms for the MultiWeave framework
Provide the foundation models (LLMs) that will be orchestrated in the routing experiments
Enable logging and evaluation of model performance

Aligns with the approved research topic Datascience and engineering.

checks.name: Prohibited Use Screening (LC 2.7)
checks.notes: No mention of sensitive terms in the documentation.
